评论详情: I love this Lululemon dupe!  Usually Lululemon tops are made for models who have long arms, but this one fits me perfectly. It is well made and soft. Love the color too. For reference, my chest measurement is 36 inches and I ordered a size small. It's fits slim on me so if you want it to fit looser, order the next size up. It's cropped so the waist sits at my belly button. It's a nice top for the prize and look of a more expensive version.

I like the thickness of the fabric, the stitching detail looks well done. I haven’t washed it yet. I appreciate the high neck, I think the front lock could be a smidgen larger so your hands can go into the pockets easily when you have thumbs in the cuffs. I do like the cuffs. The color is kind of creamy with grey. It’s seems to fit well, slightly oversized and a bit boxy. I had just taken it out the packaging in the photos.

Super cute and comfy, feels very well made. The fabric doesn’t stretch, however, so if you have long arms the thumb holes might feel tight. However, I’m not sure it’s worth $45. I’m keeping it only because I got it on sale— the zipper and zipper closure are completely different materials. The zipper itself is a nice, shiny rose gold— actually metal. The closure, however, is a dark solid gold colored plastic material. They don’t match super great but from a normal distance it’s not super noticeable. I couldn’t tell from the product photos that they weren’t the same material so I’m not super happy about that, I expected them both to be metal. It’s disappointing. I haven’t washed it yet so I’m not sure how it holds up but the material feels really structured and sturdy. I’d recommend if you can get it on sale for $30 or a little less. I got the medium and it fits very well— I typically like a looser fit. This I would say fits true to size in the chest and waist but the arms lengthwise are a little tight when fully outstretched if I’m using the thumb holes so I’d recommend sizing up.

I love the fit and quality of this sweatshirt! Very comfortable with an oversized feel that doesn’t feel frumpy. It’s a comfortable length and the colors are accurate. I ordered one for my son’s soccer games and loved it so much I ordered another color! Looks cute with leggings or jeans .

评论概述: Looks nice but no stretch, definitely size up
评论详情: I’m 5’8, 130lbs and got the medium. Definitely cut smaller than I thought it would be, not a lot of shoulder room. I think it might be too small after I wash it so I’ll probably exchange for a size up if I decide to keep it. I also have pretty long arms and when I reach out the sleeves are definitely too short.  The quality is nice and the cut is pretty flattering. I was surprised by the lack of stretch in the fabric, not quite as cozy as I hoped. I definitely like how it looks more than I like how it feels. The fabric is just kind of stiff, but might be better in a bigger size
Love the look, feel, fit and warmth.  Got it for a trip to Denver in January! Was able to layer easily under it and still wear my puffy jacket.  I got a large because I like my sweatshirts loose.

I read previous reviews and decided to get the article. It’s as good as described. Quality made, warm, thick, sporty. I first got M as suggest but it ended up too big on me. I exchanged for S. I’m 5’-3” 135lbs. This fits me well & I typically like tighter fit. It is pretty cropped (works for me) but I can see where it may be too short for someone. Color off-white

I got the Medium Sea Blue to wear to Rams game - impressed with thick quality of fabric & the zipper hood to protect the neck...I usually wear a 6 S/M -the Med provided adequate coverage - it is a boxy/oversized design - very on trend I am purchasing more colors

I love this sweater! It is really comfortable and can be dressed up or down. The lighter color might be hard to keep clean but for the price I am in love! The only downfall is that there is no stretch to it at all

I've gotten several compliments on this in the first couple months of wearing this! I was looking for a more cropped fit and this was perfect; it hits right at the hip. The collar is pretty tall but keeps me warm. The material is thick, which I love because it keeps you nice and warm.

For reference I’m 5’5 and 120 lbs and after rewarding some reviews ordered a medium although mainly I am a small. Glad I sized up! The sleeves would have been too too short with a small and the medium fits snug. Great material soft and warm very happy and will probably buy other colors!

评论概述: Perfect, size up for oversized fit.
评论详情: The quality is outstanding. If you are looking for an oversized look, I suggest you size up. I am 5’6 196lbs and purchased a L but and XL would have given the oversized looked. The large just looks rather fitted. I don’t have a large chest.
Maybe could have been a bit longer but I still found it warm and comfortable.

Loved the length and feel, just super wide from a side view. I kept it but for my jacket to wear over my workout clothes to the gym. Not something I feel cute in (5-6, 128lbs, size 27 in Levis, size 4/6 in lulu).

I purchased this last spring and love it.  It is one of my go-to sweatshirts!  Looks and feels more expensive than it is.It does need to be dried flat and I just pop it in the dryer on low for a minute or two once dried to get out any possible wrinkles from washing.  It did shrink a little bit when my husband put it in the dryer on a full cycle but I still love it.  Would buy it again!
Great quality- thick material- very comfortable. Doesn’t have much stretch/give but overall great!

评论用户: Beautiful earrings! They come with buttons and don’t feel heavy. Great quality.
评论详情: Such a comfy piece and a lululemon dupe.  The top part doesn’t stay down if you want to fold it. Some people might find it too high when it is zipped.
I love the color.  The texture. Interior fleece makes the sweater warm.  But at the same time breathable because it is opened at the hip high. I am 5’6”. 145 pound.  Pear shape.

This sweatshirt is so cute. And excellent quality, soft and thick. A size S is usually the suggested size for me. But a size M was suggested so I ordered a medium.  It was far too wide and long for me. I’m 118lbs, 5’4”.  It is a cropped style sweatshirt. And that way it is cut I would not suggest sizing up for length. A medium was extra wide. Super cute- but do not size up.

评论概述: Too short and wide at the bittom
评论详情: Good quality but too wide at the bottom… the wind goes right up it… but a nice heavy quality…

评论概述: It’s good quality, nice and warm and definitely cropped
评论详情: Great quality! Thick and warm. The olive color was a bit washed out, but not badly. I would say size up one size.  I will say, and this may be a tall girl problem, is that it is certainly cropped. Barely comes to just below my navel. I get that it’s cropped but, given the nature of this article of clothing being more so for cold weather, it would seem that, in this context ‘cropped’ should mean at least to waistband. For reference, I am 235-ish, 5’9 and bought a XXL.

I was influenced and purchased this sweatshirt after seeing it on Instagram.  It is a cute sweatshirt, but being a taller person with a long torso, I did not love its cropped length.  Additionally, I purchased the Off-White color, but it was white with grey speckles, which I didn't love, so I returned it.
Good lululemon dupe and price is fair.  Very comfortable.
Super warm and soft.  True to size.  Looks great on.
I was so impressed with the plush fabric of this sweatshirt! I order it for a cricut project and I get sooo many compliments on it. Definitely have my eye on another one for the future.
It’s a very nice sweatshirt however for me it was a little to short in length l did like the high neck

评论概述: Does the job but fit is a bit off
评论详情: Ordered in both the Medium and Large. Ended up keeping the Large. Arms are a bit tight, even in the large. Good color, good quality, just feels like the sizing/fit is a little odd.
The quality it nice considering the price. I’m happy with the cream color. The material is soft and comfortable. I’m 5’2 115 and a small fits well.
Loved the warmth it provides! Absolutely in love with the style! I almost have 3 of same style as it’s just is that perfect!

评论概述: Short even for a cropped style.
评论详情: I really tried to like this. The fabric is plenty thick enough, but it is too short even for a cropped style. I am only 5'2" for reference, the sweatshirt definitely looks longer on line. The fabric is soft, but I haven't worn it long enough to know if it is actually warm.
Me encantó, es igual a la foto y el diseño de cuello, Wow, Lo Ame y pediré en otros colores
This sweatshirt is super high quality. The material is thick (although not stretchy at all) and the cut is very flattering. I am 5’6” 135lbs and I got the Medium.
Looks good on a 67 year old
Got the cream, no stretch but i grab for this one often. If your i between sizes size up
True to size, recommend sizing up for a lose fit vs snug fit
Very comfy and super cute. A little shorter than I thought, but I love the way it looks.

I really wanted to love THE GYM PEOPLE Womens' Half Zip Pullover Fleece Stand Collar Crop Sweatshirt with Pockets, but found the fit to be too wide and boxy, and the sleeves were too long. The material is thick and the color was true to the photos online. I returned it because of the poor fit.
Love this pullover over. My only frustration is you can't pull up sleeves more than an inch or so. Cuffs are tightly sewn and do not give.
Super cozy and soft material and keeps you warm! Looks very expensive and great quality. Highly Recommend!!
Love the color, love the weight, cute and structured enough to seem pulled together
Well made sweatshirt, pairs perfectly with yoga pants or jeans. Love the stitching and gold zipper!
High quality and looks just like Lululemon. I sized up for a looser fit

The quality of this is AMAZING! Excellent high end look and feel, zipper, etc. However, note it is for sure a crop style and runs small. The XL fits too perfectly rather than oversized and I am a true broad shoulder/big bust XL. Super bummed they do not offer this in a more true waist/hip length.

评论概述: Perfect Dupe of the Expensive Lemon Brand
评论详情: Absolutely love this sweatshirt. It is an exact dupe for the more expensive athletic wear brand.
True to size, color was perfect and washed fine!
Love the look. Very comfortable and warm.

It looks good. However, the material feels heavy and stiff. It isn’t exactly soft. Also, I found the sleeves to be a bit short. I’m 5’7”, about 137 lbs. if I wanted to use the thumb holes in the sleeves, it would be very uncomfortable as the sleeves are just too short for that.
ADORABLE!! So cozy & very well made. Looks spot on with a popular sought after brand.

These are great knock offs. Thick and super comfortable. Sizing is true to size. The small hits me right at my waist and I am 5’3. Thumb slot for outdoors keeping my hands warm too. I love it so much I bought it in 3 different colors.
Great quality , went to breakfast , sat down . 3 people came up to me and ask me about my sweater .
Wish I would’ve sized up would’ve loved it a little bit more roomy

评论用户: Very cute bathing suit and great quality! I just found that it did not have the coverage I was looking for. I bought my normal size and thought it was too revealing especially from behind.
评论详情: Love this sweatshirt. It’s a nice and thick shirt and is soft. It’s just like the lululemon scuba but fits a little less boxy

This half zip is warm and feels well made. The gold hardware definitely elevates it. The size small feels slightly smaller then other half zips I own. I really like the weight and structure. Verify your size because there is not alot of stretch around the waistband.

This is warm and comfortable but the sleeves are too short, especially if you want to use the thumb holes, which I do. I bought a medium and I’m 5’5” and 148 pounds. I don’t have especially long arms. The crop length hits right at the top of my hip bone. Like it said it’s warm and roomy/comfy but I’m bummed about the sleeve length.

This thing was a shiny material which I do NOT prefer..I won't wear it. It fit properly but it's cold when you put it on..I wanted like a sweatshirt type material and this was more of a nylon type material. I was sad when I saw it- gave it to my daughter- she is pre menopausal and needs cooler items so...it just wasn't for me.

评论概述: Winter staple for a causal day
评论详情: It’s a little short and boxy but soft, warm and does the job for running errands.
True to size. Warm and cute. Great compliments.

This sweatshirt is just ok. As others stated, there’s NO stretch in the waistband or wrists, which is fine if you order it big enough. I am almost always a size Small in most brands, sometimes an XSmall — I ordered the Medium and am happy I did. It has a barely oversized boxy look, it’s cute and comfortable. I think any smaller and I would feel constricted. It’s just ok, but I’m too lazy to return and wanted something easy to throw on for going to the gym. I wouldn’t buy again unless it was about $25.  Far overpriced!! I haven’t washed it, but am nervous as the tag says not to dry it?! I always dry on low… we’ll see.
This is a very nice quality sweatshirt I’ve reordered more in different colors also ordered several for gifts. They run true to size and hold up good when washed.
Loved the fit and material!
El material y acabado es genial. Es bien abrigado. Me gusta ese detalle en los puños . Es buena calidad
Soft...warm...but the fit is very boxy. I will not return as it is warm and will do what I need it too but it will not be warn without a jacket or vest....the fit is very odd.
The sweater came and was dirty and stinky? Possibly someone ran it over with a dirty bike tire then returned it? It’s very cute, not stretchy, very thick and soft. Size up for a looser fit.
Lulu look alike. So comfortable and thick and great quality. Will purchase another color!
Sweatshirt is a decent material, but it has no stretch to it.  It was too stiff for my liking.  Unfortunately, I had to return.
So soft the size is exact.  Very warm and quality fabric
This item was on 19 yr old granddaughters Christmas list. Nice weight fabric. This is not a long shirt, but hits at waist.  Gorgeous color is true to photo.

I'm 5'4'' and have a short torso and this sweatshirt barely hit the top of my mid-rise jeans. The sweatshirt is well made and felt warm but anytime I moved, it lifted and exposed my mid section. I'm certainly not a prude but dealing with that all day just doesn't interest me, especially since its slightly on the boxier side. If it was 4'' longer I would have kept it and probably been happy.

I bought many of these for my daughters and daughter in laws and each one felt a bit different. The sizes seemed to vary a bit as well as the material (some softer than others).  I never put in dryer as I’m afraid it will shrink. The material is somewhat stiff, it’s warm, and a bit short at the waist. That’s the fit I was looking for. I’ve received compliments and looks like lulu for much less the cost. I bought the green, black and grey and like all the colors.  Washes well. Looks good with leggings.

Material is soft and thick but has absolutely no stretch. I’m 5’8” at 195lbs. Ordered a large and hate how cropped it is. Front pocket nearly covers my chest. Color and zipper are a perfect combo so I was bummed that this didn’t work out.

评论概述: Feels Nice, cute for Working Out
评论详情: I missed the fact that this is specifically for the gym. It's roomy and definitely cropped, but not a bad length with jeans. It's lined with fleece which is nice and it's cozy with a thin long sleeve shirt underneath. Only major con is that it's not stretchy at all, so make sure you order the right size. I'm 180lb and 5'4 and I normally order a L and it fit fine.

评论概述: Nice sweatshirt, not the same as Lulu
评论详情: I have the Lulu scuba version of this and bought the dupe to see how it was. There’s enough differences that I wouldn’t say they were the same but this is still a nice top. One thing I don’t like about the Lulu version is how boxy it can be. The hem is really wide since you order as xs/s, m/l etc. this top you order in a specific size so it seems to fit less boxy and isn’t as wide at the hemline. The material is still thick like the scuba material is, neckline is the same. My only complaint is that the length of the arms seems a little short and I don’t have long arms. If I put both arms straight out in front of me the sleeves are about 2 inches or so from my wrists. I always pull my sleeves back to my mid forearm so that’s fine for me but might bother other people. Overall, good quality, I would recommend just expect some differences from the scuba.

To start with, I am 5'1" and athletically built. I ordered a small. I really like the jacket because it's soft warm, and well made. I love that it can come up high around the neck without feeling like its choking me. It fits me for the most part, particularly in the length and width of the torso part. The only issue I have with the jacket is the length of the arms. The jacket needs to be made where the sleeves are a solid 1"-1.25" longer! When my arms are down by my side the length of the sleeves is fine. But when I raise my arms up, especially overhead, the sleeves become too short (and its not like I have long arms or something). I can't utilize the thumb holes for that reason. I haven't washed it yet, and I'm afraid it might shrink when I do. If you're debating which size to get, get both then return the one that doesn't fit as well.
I really like this sweatshirt! Quality material. The only complaint is that the cuff on it is not stretchy at all and it is hard to get over my hand sometimes.
Exactly what I was looking for ... reminds me of a brand that sells similar... I ordered Off White and it's definitely NOT off white - more  grey - I'll keep but disappointed in the color

评论概述: Title: Stylish Sweatshirt with a little Room for Improvement - Women's Half Zip Pullover Fleece
评论详情: I recently purchased the Women's Half Zip Pullover Fleece Stand Collar Crop Sweatshirt with Pockets and Thumb Hole, and while it has some positive aspects, there are areas that could be improved.  Let's start with the positives. The style of this sweatshirt is trendy and fashionable. The crop length and stand collar give it a modern look that pairs well with high-waisted bottoms. I appreciate the inclusion of thumb holes, which add a cozy touch and keep the sleeves in place during movement. The pockets are also a handy feature for storing small items.  However, the material of the sweatshirt did not meet my comfort expectations. The fleece used feels rough and lacks the softness I typically associate with fleece fabrics. It falls short in terms of providing the cozy comfort and warmth I was hoping for in a sweatshirt.  The fit of the sweatshirt is generally decent. The crop length and relaxed cut offer a casual and relaxed look. The stand collar can be zipped up for extra warmth, and the overall fit is satisfactory. Functionality-wise, the thumb holes are a nice addition, but I found them to be a bit snug and uncomfortable after prolonged wear. In terms of durability, the sweatshirt has held up well through a few washes without significant fading or shrinking. Following the care instructions is essential to maintain its quality.  The price of the sweatshirt falls within a reasonable range.  The Women's Half Zip Pullover Fleece Stand Collar Crop Sweatshirt has its positive style elements, but there is room for improvement in terms of material comfort and fit. With some enhancements, this sweatshirt has the potential to be a great option for stylish and comfortable loungewear.

评论概述: Thick material  short fit arms short also
评论详情: Washed it seemed to lose its softness. Difficult to return
The quality is great on this sweatshirt it is def a good dupe for the lulu version. However, the sizing is def smaller and not true to size. I wear a large and got an XL and it still wear snug
Soo good for winter, and such good quality definitely a 10/10

评论概述: It shrinks a full size after a wash
评论详情: Product looks and feels of good quality but it shrunk a full size after a wash.
I love this. I like that it's a little cropped and it looks great with high waisted pants and leggings.
It’s my go to sweater. I love the color and how lightweight it is.

评论概述: Wish I could give it a 3.5 star Review
评论详情: Definitely very thick and warm and very durable. Comfortable, as long as you don’t want to roll your sleeves up. This thing has absolutely no stretch, so I needed to size up not for my chest but so that the arm holes would be big enough that I could roll my sleeves up if I got warm. True to color and it’s definitely cute and very warm! Just wish the material was stretchier

评论概述: Larger size is wide but not any longer
评论详情: I sized up as several reviewers suggested because I wanted an oversized look. I ordered a medium and found the arm length and body length to be great, but the width of the garment is like a tent. I hope it will shrink in the wash. Material is nice and thick. I wish I would’ve ordered a small, my normal size. (5’7” long torso, 125lbs)

评论概述: True to size, VERY warm, thick but no stretch.
评论详情: Bought pink and off white and they look adorable on! The cropped cut hits exactly in the right spot and these suckers are WARM! I bought ahead of the 2024 arctic blast and they did the job of keeping me extra warm. I’m in mild Oklahoma weather so my wardrobe isn’t equipped for “arctic”. My only complaint is that there is zero stretch anywhere on this top so putting these on and taking off is a little treacherous when the zipper skims across your face. I scratched myself a little when I expected some “give” and didn’t get any. Difficult to don and doff. The lack of stretch completely eliminates my ability to push these sleeves up even to the mid arm. Very thick at the wrists. Keeping them bc they look great but will look for something more stretchy moving forward.

评论概述: Great fabric and colors, super cozy
评论详情: To start, I went from 0 to 3 of these within a weekend. I bought the pitaya red (my favorite!) and the white to start. The colors are fantastic! Then I purchased the off-white because my 12yo decided she wanted the white. I’m 5’2”, about 150 and the medium fits great! It’s a shorter look, falls about the bottom of my hip bones and not too cropped. I willingly gave up the white because it seemed to be a smidge shorter than the pitaya red and off-white. My take on some of the reviews: The sleeves being too short (I don’t have that problem); the pullover is boxy (roomy sure, but I don’t feel boxed out) and the collar coming up too high when zipped all the way (while it does come up high, you can see that in the pictures and if you live in the northeast like I do, that’s a good thing!) The tag reads 50% cotton/poly blend - for me they seem to get a bit loose (and snuggly) between washes, and go back to original size after washing and drying on medium.  Overall I would totally recommend these - especially if you snag the lightening deals. I ended up getting all 3 on sale, so for $20-$30 they’re a great deal, I think $45 is too much (but I never like to pay full price for stuff).
I ordered the cream color with the gold zipper. Looks classy and is very soft. Great for the price! Highly recommend.

评论概述: So soft and a great scuba lulu look a like
评论详情: So warm. Great length - love the gold zipper. Wish they sold more with gold zippers.

评论概述: The best pullover half zip sweatshirt.
评论详情: This has got to be one of my favorite sweatshirts ever. The oatmeal color and the gold, detailed zipper pairs. Well with all of my Gym wear. This sweatshirt is very versatile and so comfortable. I love that. It is very soft and cozy.  I wear the sweatshirt almost every day, and it has not ruined the quality of it by washing it as many times as I have already. I also get so many compliments on it every time I wear it. I am 5’3” and 135 lbs and I ordered a medium and it fits perfect and the cropped length is perfect.

I like the thickness and fit but it has zero stretch. I literally can’t roll my sleeves up to wash my hands. I’d return it but it’s too late. There are other brands that I found are way better with same style.

评论概述: It’s not the best Lulu dupe out there
评论详情: The sleeves are huge while the body is close fitting. The wrist cuffs are tight and I have small wrists! It’s kind of stiff overall.

Tried it on this weekend seems to have good material kind of thick but the sleeves were short for me if I put my thumb through the keyhole It would pull at my shoulders really bad so unfortunately I'm going to have to return it. I would suggest getting a size up from your normal size

I was and am still looking for a 1/4 zip bright pink sweatshirt, with pockets! This fit all the checkmarks! It’s well made and I really wanted to love it! The only reason I returned it is that it’s a cropped style! I knew this when I ordered it, but I’m short (5’1-1/2”)so I thought it wouldn’t matter that much! For me  and my style comfort, I want it to be a little longer on my body! I ordered an xl for reference! I still highly recommend it if you like the shorter style!
I like that this sweatshirt is half cotton.  It is very thick and cuddly.  The style is unique and attractive.  It seems to wash well, no dryer.  I bought two.

I really like the sweatshirt, it is comfortable and because I'm short, I like where it hits me. I got the cream with the gold zipper, and I just love the look of the two together. One warning is that it doesn't have a lot of stretch. This is noticeable when putting it on and off (but it's fine while you're wearing it) and when I go to wash my hands, it's not easy to pull up the sleeves. I would purchase it again. No regrets, even with the lack of stretch.

This is the second one I bought in a different color. I like the way it looks and feels. Only complaint is sleeves are a little stiff and narrow especially around the wrists so maybe size up if you like a looser fit
Beautiful, thick fabric. Warm and looks very much like something I would purchase at Lululemon will be buying a different colors

评论概述: Great lulu dupe but not perfect
评论详情: Based on looks and feel this is very similar to the lulu scuba funnel neck! The key differences are the stretchiness and thickness of the fabric. The lulu version is stretchy in the cuffs of the sleeves and the bottom hem, this version has 0 stretch. It’s hard to roll up the sleeves. It’s slightly less thick than the lulu version, but I honestly prefer it with the little stretch. Size up if you want an oversized look similar to the lulu version. I usually am a S/M, got a L in this.

Did not want to pay over $100 for the LuLu version. This is a great alternative. Super warm and the cropped length is on trend. Pairing with Athleta  Ribbed Salutation joggers and a CRZ Yoga Pima Cotton Long sleeve shirt with rounded hem for a warm but put together althleisure look. At 5’6” and 118 lbs I sized up because I’m and inverted triangle and wanted to make sure the sweatshirt wasn’t too tight in the shoulders. Size chart reccomended Small and I purchased Medium. Glad I did because the sleeves are barely long enough. I don’t like using thumb holes so it’s ok for my needs but if you plan on using that feature you’d have to go up 2 sizes which makes the sweatshirt super boxy. The fit is why I only gave this item 4 stars. Seems like it is scaled to  shorter, more petite gals. Also, worth noting… the description lists this as a 70/30 cotton poly blend which is why is selected this brand over others, however the clothing tag says 50/50. Washed once and it has not pilled. Will update review if pilling occurs.
These are amazing. I need one in every color!!! Comfy!
